Title: Provides for revocation of probation where a person is convicted of a new offense while such person is under probation supervision for a felony offense
Summary: Provides for revocation of probation where a person is convicted of a felony or an offense in another jurisdiction which if committed in this state would constitute a felony, while the defendant is under probation supervision for a felony offense.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to revocation of probation and re-sentencing upon conviction of a felony while under probation supervision for a felony conviction
